```{r, setup=TRUE}
library(navr)
library(ggplot2)
obj <- navr_object
obj <- add_time_columns(obj)
obj <- add_distances(obj)
obj <- add_speeds(obj)
```

## Plotting
PLotting path of the subject
```{r}
plot_path(obj)
plot_position_heatmap(obj)
```

## complex plotting
```{r}
plt <- plot_path(obj)
plt + geom_navr_heatmap(obj, 25, alpha=0.3)
```


## Animations
```{r}
